Control Name: Analyzes Internal and External Factors—Risk identification considers both internal and external factors and their impact on the achievement of objectives.

control_attributes.Control: Analyzes Internal and External Factors—Risk identification considers both internal and external factors and their impact on the achievement of objectives.
control_attributes.SubCategory: CC3.2 COSO Principle 7: The entity identifies risks to the achievement of its objectives across the entity and analyzes risks as a basis for determining how the risks should be managed.
